title: Quick Contact
summary: It easier to find the contact more with this app
developerAddress: 兵庫県尼崎市猪名寺２丁目
description: QuickContact is an address book and contact manager for use by professionals and individuals alike.  The app functions equally as well on Android phones and tablets. Contacts are organized by groups and provide direct links to initiate calls or e-mails.  The numerous settings allow a user to customize group and individual contact displays, as well as general functions, for maximum speed and efficiency.Apps function　・group view　・call log view　・favorite view　・alphabet view　・keyword view　・mashroom plugin　・dialer(T9 iunput)　・group ringtone settings　・layout customize　・contact widget　・group widget　・prefix　・group mail　・swipe UI　・contact share　・group filter     more...for Beta Appshttps://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.miruker.qcontact
descriptionHTML:
QuickContact is an address book and contact manager for use by professionals and individuals alike. The app functions equally as well on Android phones and tablets. Contacts are organized by groups and provide direct links to initiate calls or e-mails. The numerous settings allow a user to customize group and individual contact displays, as well as general functions, for maximum speed and efficiency.


Apps function
　・group view
　・call log view
　・favorite view
　・alphabet view
　・keyword view
　・mashroom plugin
　・dialer(T9 iunput)
　・group ringtone settings
　・layout customize
　・contact widget
　・group widget
　・prefix
　・group mail
　・swipe UI
　・contact share
　・group filter
more...

for Beta Apps
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.miruker.qcontact
comments: The number of contacts shown in each group is incorrect.
Does not Work on Android Wear We Dont need such dissapointing non working apps.

Quite a gem! Small, quick, and most importantly provides group functionality with my Outlook groups for managing and emailing the group. UI is simplistic but clean and functional. There are "surprises" in that it is not clear what you get for upgrading, unless you try a setting or try to use a widget and then get prompted for the upgrade. I'd give it 5 if there was better information on this, and may purchase the upgrade anyway just to say 'Thank you!" for making a simple app that handles contact groups on Android Marshmallow.
Doesn't work Very hard to use. Missing phone numbers. Incorrect group info. Better design over all others.
Search option App is good but it would be good if a search option is added to make calls with names rather than scrolling with alphabet order.
recentChanges: change supported os is android 5.0 higher
supported default phone app. android 6.0 higher
